https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/7RxwJNfqepJav2SSEi5EstoofVy.jpg In a crime-noir about the urban child-soldier, Akilla Brown captures a fifteen-year-old Jamaican boy in the aftermath of an armed robbery. Over one gruelling night, Akilla confronts a cycle of generational violence he thought he escaped. Akilla's Escape
